name: The Dark Hours
description: A MURDER YEARS IN THE MAKING. A murder in the middle of a street party seems a senseless tragedy. But the victim had a dark past which came back to haunt him.

name: The Man Who Died Twice
description: THE SECOND NOVEL IN THE RECORD-BREAKING, MILLION-COPY BESTSELLING THURSDAY MURDER CLUB SERIES BY RICHARD OSMAN

name: A Will and a Way
description: As each decade passes, and the family assemble again, one question hovers over them. Can you ever escape the repercussions of a broken promise?

name: James Patterson
description: The Women's Murder Club is back with a fiendish new case which the four friends will need to call upon all their ingenuity to solve...
